question: 1.From whom my wife should do purdah 2.I have seen a very bad dream about me and my wife. What should I do (sadqa etc)
answer:
QUESTION
From whom my wife should do purdah 1) My brother 2) My brother in law. 3) My 1st cousins. 4) My 2nd cousins. 5) Her brother in laws. 6) Her 1st cousin 7) Her 2nd cousin.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Many bad dreams are from Shaytaan who wishes to instill fear in a person
and distract his/her attention in Ibaadat. You should recite, 'Laa hawla
walaa quwwata illaa billaah' and ignore the dream. Giving charity is indeed
an efficient way of averting evil from one's path.
2. All the relatives in reference are Ghayr Mahrams (not prohibited in
marriage). In principle, a female must maintain Hijaab from any Ghayr
Mahram.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
